commitMessage:
feat: implement Progress Path student progress tracking application

Comprehensive Blazor Server application for real-time student progress
monitoring featuring:
- Google OAuth authentication with Teacher/Student roles
- Group management with AI-powered goal interpretation via LLMTornado
- QR code generation for student joining (QRCoder)
- Text chat with math rendering (KaTeX) and code highlighting (Prism.js)
- Voice dictation via Web Speech API
- Real-time SignalR updates for teacher dashboard
- Inactivity monitoring and off-topic detection with alerts
- TherapistTemplate visual theme with animated particles
- Docker Compose development environment with SQL Server
- Azure deployment scripts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
